name: dirt
description: It's dirt.  Although from ISEKAI, it looks no different from ordinary soil.  Seems like some fine earth suitable for tilling.  Could also be dug out for construction projects.

name: forest floor
description: Covered in twigs and lots of brown, decaying leaves from ISEKAI.

name: moss
description: A patch of moist, spongy moss growing unnaturally lush from prolonged exposure to the ambient magic.

name: dead grass
description: An area of long, shaggy grass that hasn't been cut recently, growing quickly from exposure to the ambient magic.

name: grazed grass
description: An area of extremely short green stubble protruding from the dirt, growing quickly from exposure to the ambient magic.  Something has been clearly grazing here.

name: grass
description: An area of hardy magical grass about ankle high, growing unnaturally lush from prolonged exposure to the ambient magic.  Cutting the grass short enough would destroy the root system, causing this area to turn into a patch of dirt.

name: long grass
description: An area of long, shaggy grass about shin high, growing unnaturally lush from prolonged exposure to the ambient magic.

name: tall grass
description: An area of tall grass about head high, growing unnaturally lush from prolonged exposure to the ambient magic.
